summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2703, for the improvement of 29th Avenue North from East John Street to East Madison Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by construction of concrete walks or stairways, the reconstruction of existing wooden curbs where necessary, the construction of cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31787 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
